game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: Embark on a journey to the forgotten ruins and retrieve the lost artifact to bring peace to the kingdom.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Talk to the village elder to learn about the ruins' whereabouts.
A powerful beast guards the artifact. Conquer it to proceed.

task.objective: Explore the ruins and find the artifact
task.description: Carefully navigate the ancient traps and puzzles to reach the heart of the ruins.
